title: Rust Enum Destructuring and Usage
description: In this lab, we have code that demonstrates the usage of enums in Rust, including how to destructure an enum using a match statement and access the associated values based on the enum variant.

meta.title: Mastering Rust Enum Destructuring: Unlock the Power of Data Structures
meta.description: Dive into the world of Rust enums and learn how to effectively destructure and utilize them in your programming projects.
meta.keywords: data structures, rust playground, destructuring, enum, rust online compiler, rust tutor, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online

i18n.title: Rust 枚举解构与用法

meta.title: 掌握 Rust 枚举解构：释放数据结构的强大力量
